summary: When a proud noble refuses to kiss the hand of the despotic King James in 1690, he is cruelly executed and his son surgically disfigured.
cast: Mary Philbin|Conrad Veidt|Julius Molnar|Olga Baclanova|Brandon Hurst|Cesare Gravina|Stuart Holmes|Sam De Grasse|George Siegmann|Josephine Crowell|Károly Huszár|Zimbo the Dog|Delmo Fritz|Deno Fritz|Henry A. Barrows|Richard Bartlett|Les Bates|Charles Brinley|Carmen Castillo|Allan Cavan|D'Arcy Corrigan|Carrie Daumery|Howard Davies|Nick De Ruiz|Louise Emmons|J.C. Fowler|John George|Jack A. Goodrich|Charles Hancock|Lila LaPon|George Marion|Torben Meyer|Joe Murphy|Edgar Norton|Broderick O'Farrell|Lon Poff|Frank Puglia|Henry Roquemore|Templar Saxe|Allan Sears|Scott Seaton|Louis Stern|Al Stewart|Anton Vaverka
title: El hombre que ríe
